statements: SELECT * FROM guest_information
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM guest_information WHERE reservation_date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT * FROM guest_information ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time ASC
SELECT guest_id, name, address FROM guest_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM guest_information ORDER BY reservation_date ASC, reservation_time ASC
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE reservation_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY name ASC, reservation_time DESC, guest_id
SELECT guest_id, name, email FROM guest_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, guest_id
SELECT name, address FROM guest_information WHERE reservation_time > '12:00:00' AND reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reservation_date, reservation_time
SELECT * FROM guest_information WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY name, reservation_date DESC
SELECT guest_id, phone_number, reservation_date FROM guest_information WHERE reservation_date < '2022-02-15' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, guest_id
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_name, contact_number FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, room_number FROM reservations WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_history->'last_reservation' AS last_reservation FROM guests;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email_address FROM guests ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, contact_number FROM guests WHERE email_address IS NULL;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, total_amount FROM guests JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guests JOIN reservations ON guests.guest_id = reservations.guest_id WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM guest_info;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservation_history WHERE guest_id = 2;
SELECT city, country, postal_code FROM contact_details WHERE guest_id = 3;
SELECT name, email, phone_number, city, country, postal_code FROM guest_info JOIN contact_details ON guest_info.guest_id = contact_details.guest_id WHERE guest_info.guest_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM guest_info WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT guest_id, name, email FROM guest_info WHERE guest_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM reservation_history WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservation_history WHERE guest_id = 456 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT g.name, g.email, c.address, c.city, c.country FROM guest_info g JOIN contact_details c ON g.guest_id = c.guest_id WHERE c.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, reservation_date FROM guests ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM guests WHERE reservation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, name FROM guests ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, room_number FROM reservations WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT city, state FROM contact_details WHERE zip_code LIKE '9%';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM guests;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, address_id, city, state FROM guests JOIN addresses ON guests.guest_id = addresses.guest_id;
SELECT full_name, payment_id, card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM guests JOIN payment_info ON guests.guest_id = payment_info.guest_id;
SELECT guest_id, comment_text, comment_date FROM guest_comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM guests WHERE reservation_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01' AND check_in_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT g.full_name, a.city, p.card_number FROM guests g JOIN addresses a ON g.guest_id = a.guest_id JOIN payment_info p ON g.guest_id = p.guest_id;
SELECT g.full_name, count(gc.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM guests g LEFT JOIN guest_comments gc ON g.guest_id = gc.guest_id GROUP BY g.full_name HAVING total_comments > 1;
